comments:
I have a Issue with last version callisto (3.2 final) + WTP +TPTP + Datatools . 
the problem occurs for the New Dynamic Web Project wizard (with new target runtime : tomcat 4.1).
  
I don't understand how to reproduce this issue !! 

@see Bug 149542, Bug 108392 : maybe something with cancel wizard.
